name: (Pantheon|Edit App) Edit app with empty required fields negative
id: stories/pantheon/UserApps.story;(Pantheon|Edit App) Edit app with empty required fields negative

testSteps.description: (Pantheon|Edit App) Edit app with empty required fields negative #1: {appFormField=Application name, formError=Application name field is required., regression-pantheon=}

children.description: And navigate to Pantheon LogIn page from Home page
And navigate to Pantheon User Account page from LogIn page
And open Edit App Page for the first application
When clear field {Application name} on Edit App Page
And save changes on Edit App Page
Then the message {Application name field is required.} is displayed
(Pantheon|Edit App) Edit app with empty required fields negative #2: {appFormField=Redirect URI, formError=Callback URL is required for Oauth Product, regression-pantheon=}
And navigate to Pantheon LogIn page from Home page
And navigate to Pantheon User Account page from LogIn page
And open Edit App Page for the first application
When clear field {Redirect URI} on Edit App Page
And save changes on Edit App Page
Then the message {Callback URL is required for Oauth Product} is displayed

userStory.narrative:
In order to manage my Apps
As a user of Ticket Master Developer portal
I want to perform CRUD operations with my apps
